content: inches/3 8 4 45 5 cm shorter than the desired length shape toe round 1 decrease round sole k1 ssk work to last 3 sts k2tog k1 instep k1 ssk work to last 3 sts k2tog k1 round 2 plain round work even repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 36 40 44 total sts rem work decrease round only until 16 sts rem 8 instep sts 8 sole sts finishing holding needle 1 and needle 2 together graft sts using kitchener stitch weave in ends work second sock suzanne sjögren - spinningyarnsdesigns@gmail com http //www ravelry com/designers/suzanne-sjogren https //www facebook com/spinningyarnsdesigns/ +46 704568832 december 16 2019
